programmes.show_description: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.
Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault. Meanwhile, Captain Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.
The squad searches for two suspects after a Muslim lady is attacked inside a synagogue; Benson is shocked that Rob Miller is out on bail.
Crime drama series. Benson suspects Rob Miller to be responsible for the death of a girl found in Hudson River, but due to lack of evidence she cannot apprehend him.
A nun is slain and detectives discover a connection to a unsolved case of racial violence.
Police deploy spike strips to put an end to a dangerous stolen vehicle pursuit. An alleged mechanic says he has permission to drive a semi-truck, but the owner says otherwise.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Ideal World Shopping - For All Your Shopping Needs
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
A director for a television documentary production has been killed, and a document could mean that Cabot Cove may have to change the written history.
Director Shepard is killed while trying to clean up a secret mission and Gibbs sets out to find those responsible.
Last Man Standing: US crime drama series. The murder of a petty officer uncovers an internal plot to sell highly classified military information.
Agent Afloat: The murder of a navy officer sparks a major security alert on board an aircraft carrier.
White Lie: Detectives Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a couple, with the trail leading to the wife of an army major involved in the war on drugs.
Whiplash: A murder investigation alerts the detectives to a far-reaching fraud involving staged car accidents.
Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of an uninvited nightclub guest who, before being shot, had confronted a famous musician.
Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a black publishing executive.
Crime drama series. When a priest is murdered, Briscoe and Green seek a suspect with a grudge against God but it turns out that the clergyman was not the intended target.
Deliverance: Naval crime drama. The murder of a marine leads the agents into the murky world of gang violence. Gibbs is forced to confront a mystery from his past.
Bounce: US crime drama series. Tony takes charge of the team as he reopens a case he investigated three years earlier.
South by Southwest: US crime drama. When a fellow agent is murdered, the team heads into the desert to find a woman who may hold the key to the mystery.
Hi-tech crime drama series. Finch tries to revive the Machine. Root fights for her life against an onslaught of Samaritan agents. Fusco is questioned about Elias and Dominic's deaths.
Reese and Finch reboot the Machine, but glitches cause the software to malfunction. Identifying Reese as a threat, it sends an assassin after him.
Crime drama series. Kat goes overboard when she follows up on her suspicions about a trainer at her boxing gym.
Rollins goes undercover to investigate a government worker who is dealing green cards in exchange for sex
When an actress accuses a media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse. A change in the squad room puts Carisi in a hard place.
Benson helps a young woman to remember the details and suspects in her rape. In order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it first.
Dylan and Lizzie investigate the case of a prominent divorce lawyer who is found murdered in a bizarre ritual. Dylan and Andy hit a bump in their adoption process.
When the cuffs come out, an emotional cyclist gives deputies the runaround. A boyfriend's honesty saves his girlfriend from going to jail on her birthday.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Ideal World Shopping - For All Your Shopping Needs
A man weaves a stolen motorbike through traffic at high speeds as he tries to evade police. Deputies examine the aftermath of a violent domestic argument.
Erin and Anthony try to prevent the deportation of a prominent community activist who isn't a citizen.
As Frank contends with a whistleblower within the NYPD who claims to have evidence of abuse of power in the organization, Danny and Baez investigate the case of a woman struck by a car.
When a key witness in Danny's case is killed just before testifying, Erin angers Danny by enlisting Anthony to help him find the killer.
After Emily Harrison tells Danny and Baez she's concerned her abusive ex-boyfriend will repeat his behavior with his new girlfriend, Emily becomes the prime suspect when he's murdered.
Frank has very little information when a conflicted priest who could help find a missing boy refuses to break the seal of confession.
The team's holiday plans are put on hold when a marine is killed by an exploding cell phone. Others in his former unit are also at risk.
The team investigates when a petty officer working with a high-level encryption unit is murdered at a strip club.
Callen goes undercover to investigate the murder of an ex-con recently released from prison, while the rest of the team keep tabs on him.
A scheduled training session is interrupted when an urgent call comes through indicating that an agent needs assistance.
Several men wearing marine uniforms are killed while working in a laboratory and the team is assigned to investigate the mystery.
Agent Kensi Blye is shot during a bank robbery and the situation deteriorates as the gang responsible take everyone in the bank hostage.
The death of a lieutenant commander is regarded as suicide until the team finds evidence more in keeping with a murder having been committed.
Dylan and Lizzie investigate when a street artist's work is found with a victim's body in the middle of it. Ryan catches a suspect in the Sleeping Beauty Killer investigation.
The female CEO of a popular wellness company says she was raped, but her business partner claims the accusation is part of an embezzlement cover-up
